(fn [coll n]
  (letfn [(il [x]
            (map first
                 (filter
                   #(= x (last %))

(fn intl-x [coll x]
  (let [vector (vec coll)
        length (count coll)
        collect-rec (fn [idx length vector x]
                      (loop [curr idx
                             res []]
                        (if (>= curr length)
                          res
                          (recur (+ curr x) (conj res (get vector curr))))
                        ))]
    (loop [idx 0
           res []
           handled-mod-x []]
      (if (>= idx length)
        res
        (if (contains? handled-mod-x (mod idx x))
          (recur (inc idx) res handled-mod-x)
          (recur (inc idx) (conj res (collect-rec idx length vector x)) (conj handled-mod-x idx))
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )

(fn [l, n]
   ((fn deinterleave [l, n, x]
    (if
      (= x n)
      ()
      (cons
       ((fn everyN [l, n, x]
          (let
            [
             nextX
             (if
               (= x n)
               1
               (+ x 1))]
            (cond
             (empty? l)
             l
             (= x n)
             (cons
              (first l)
              (everyN
               (rest l)
               n
               nextX))
             :else
             (everyN
              (rest l)
              n
              nextX))))
        l n n)
       (deinterleave
        (rest l)
        n
        (+ x 1)))))
   l n 0))

(fn [coll step]
  (letfn [(f [coll step]
            (cond (or (not (pos? step)) (empty? coll)) ()
                  (= step 1) coll
                  :else (loop [xs coll
                               count 0
                               acc (list (first xs))]
                          (cond (empty? xs) (reverse acc)
                                (= count step) (recur (rest xs) 1 (conj acc (first xs)))
                                :else (recur (rest xs) (inc count) acc)))))]
    (loop [xs coll
           acc ()]
      (let [sc (f xs step)]
        (cond (or (empty? xs)

(fn [s, n]
(loop [seq s i 0 res (vec (repeat n [])) ]
  (if (empty? seq)
    res
    (recur (rest seq)
           (mod (inc i) n)
           ;; update res by moving first item to nth bucket
           (assoc res i (conj (nth res i) (first seq) ))))))

  [coll number-partitions]
  "Applies the reverse of interleave onto a collection.

  collections, then creates the same number of collections by taking
  the first of each collection, the second, etc..."
  (let [partitioned-col
        (for [x (range 0 (quot (count coll) number-partitions))]
          (for [y (range 0 number-partitions)]
            (nth coll (+ (* x number-partitions) y))))]
    (for [index (range 0 number-partitions)]
      (map #(nth % index) partitioned-col))))

  [coll, n]

    ; now, ys contains n vectors

    (let [[zs i] (loop [xs coll zs ys i 0]
      (if (empty? xs)
      [zs i]
      (recur
        (rest xs) (conj (into [] (rest zs)) (conj (first zs) (first xs))) (inc i))))]

        ; divisble seqs
        zs)))

(fn rweave
  ([sq nbr i result] (cond (empty? sq) result
                           :else (recur (rest sq) nbr (inc i) (assoc result
                                                              (mod i nbr)
                                                              (conj (get result (mod i nbr))
                                                                    (first sq))))))
  ([sq nbr]
   (rweave sq nbr 0 (vec (replicate nbr [])))))

  ;take-nth where nth is n
  (seq ((fn [acc p r]

               (dec p)
               (rest r) )))
  [] n s)))

(fn [s c]
  (loop [i 0
         new-seq '()]
    (if (= i (count s))
      new-seq
      (if (nil? (nth new-seq (mod i c) nil))
        (recur (inc i) (concat new-seq (list (list (nth s i)))))
        (recur (inc i) (loop [j 0
                              inner-seq '()]
                         (if (= j (count new-seq))
                           inner-seq
                           (if (= j (mod i c))
                             (recur (inc j) (concat inner-seq (list (concat (nth new-seq j) (list (nth s i))))))
                             (recur (inc j) (concat inner-seq (list (nth new-seq j))))))))))))

(fn deinterleave [x n]
     "Converts a vector x into a vector of n sublists. (count x) must be a multiple of n."
     (loop [counter 0, result (vec (repeat n []))]
       (if (< counter (count x))
         (recur (inc counter) (assoc result (mod counter n) (conj (get result (mod counter n)) (get (vec x) counter))))
         result)))

(fn rinterleave 
  ([col n] (rinterleave col n 0 (vec (map (fn [x] ()) (range n)))))
  ([col n cur-raw res]
    (if col
      (let [cur (mod cur-raw n)]
      (rinterleave 
        (next col)
        n
        (inc cur) 
        (assoc res cur (conj (nth res cur) (first col)))))
      (map reverse res))))

(fn [input-list interleave-count]
  (let [input-count (count input-list)]
    (loop [input-list input-list
           interleave-result (repeat interleave-count '())]
      (if (nil? input-list) interleave-result
          (let [current-input-count (count input-list)
                last-input-item (last input-list)
                result-col-index (mod (- input-count current-input-count) interleave-count)
                reversed-col-index (let [x (- result-col-index (dec interleave-count))] (if (neg? x) (- x) x))
                rebuild-interleave (fn [build index new-item]
                                     (loop [build build
                                            interleave-sections '()]
                                       (if (nil? build) interleave-sections
                                           (let [interleave-section (last build)
                                                 new-interleave-section (if (= (dec (count build)) index) (cons new-item interleave-section)
                                                                            interleave-section)]
                                             (recur (butlast build) (cons new-interleave-section interleave-sections))))))
                new-interleave-result (rebuild-interleave interleave-result reversed-col-index last-input-item)]
            (recur (butlast input-list) new-interleave-result))))))

;; This code assumes that the provided collection will divide evenly into

(fn [coll num-split-colls]
  (loop [curr-coll coll
         split-colls (repeat num-split-colls (vector))]
    (let [index (rem (- (count coll) (count curr-coll)) num-split-colls)
          item (first curr-coll)
          remaining-coll (rest curr-coll)]
      (if (empty? curr-coll)
        split-colls
        (recur remaining-coll 
               (concat 
                (take index split-colls) 
                (list (conj (nth split-colls index) item))
                (take-last (- num-split-colls index 1) split-colls)))))))

(fn reverseLeave 
  ([x n ] 
   	(comment "build an initial result map with keys 0,..n-1 each mapped to empty list")
   	(reverseLeave x n (zipmap (range 0 n) (repeat n [])) 0))
  ([x n resultMap i] 
   	(comment "if no more elements, return the resulting values as a list of lists, otherwise add next element to the right bucket and recurse")
    (if (empty? x)
        (vals (into (sorted-map) resultMap))
        ( reverseLeave (rest x) n (update-in resultMap [i] (fn [oldVal] (conj oldVal (first x)))) (rem (inc i) n)  )
    )
  )
)

(fn reverse-interleave
  ;"reverse the interleave process splitting a seq into N other sequences"
  [s n]
  (cond
   ;; split into zero parts
   (zero? n) s
   :else (let [extracted-set (take-nth n s) ; every nth item 
               new-set (for [n s
                             :when (not (some #(= n %) extracted-set))]
                         n)
               n (dec n)]
           (cons extracted-set
                 (reverse-interleave new-set n)))))

(fn calc [x pos]
  ((fn iter [inner-count outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col [head-cur-col & tail-cur-col] cur-pos]
     (let [parcial-ret-col-added (concat parcial-ret-col (list head-cur-col))]
       (if (= outer-count pos)
         (if (= inner-count pos)
           (if (empty? tail-cur-col)
             (concat total-ret-col (list parcial-ret-col-added))
             (iter 1 outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col-added tail-cur-col cur-pos))
           (if (empty? tail-cur-col)
             (concat total-ret-col parcial-ret-col)
             (iter (inc inner-count) outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col tail-cur-col cur-pos)))
         (if (= inner-count outer-count)
           (if (empty? tail-cur-col)
             (iter 1 (inc outer-count) (concat total-ret-col (list parcial-ret-col)) '() x cur-pos)
             (if (= inner-count pos)
               (iter 1 outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col-added tail-cur-col cur-pos)
               (iter (inc inner-count) outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col-added tail-cur-col cur-pos)))
           (if (empty? tail-cur-col)
             (iter 1 (inc outer-count) (concat total-ret-col (list parcial-ret-col)) '() x cur-pos)
             (if (= inner-count pos)
               (iter 1 outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col tail-cur-col cur-pos)
               (iter (inc inner-count) outer-count total-ret-col parcial-ret-col tail-cur-col cur-pos))))))) 1 1 '() '() x 1))

(fn [sequence group]
 (letfn [(select-by-nth [result index select-nth rest1]
           (if (empty? rest1)
             (reverse result)
             (if (= (rem index select-nth) 0)
               (select-by-nth (conj result (first rest1)) 
                              (+ index 1) 
                              select-nth 
                              (rest rest1))
               (select-by-nth result 
                              (+ index 1) 
                              select-nth 
                              (rest rest1)))))
         (groups [result offset group sequence]
           (if (> offset 0)
             (groups (conj result 
                           (select-by-nth '() 
                                          offset 
                                          group 
                                          sequence))
                     (- offset 1)
                     group 
                     sequence)
             (reverse result)))]
   (groups '() group group sequence)))

(fn [arg-arr step]
  (let [init-arr (vec arg-arr)
        insert-points 
        (loop [range_ (range step) curr 0 arr []]
          (if-not (< (count arr) (count init-arr))
            arr
            (recur range_ 
                   (if (> (last range_) curr)
                       (inc curr) 
                       (first range_))
                   (conj arr curr))))
        new-arr (into [] (take step (cycle [[]])))]

        (loop [arr new-arr curr-idx 0]
            (if (>= curr-idx (count init-arr))
                arr
                (recur (assoc arr 
                              (insert-points curr-idx) 
                              (conj (arr (insert-points curr-idx)) (init-arr curr-idx))) 
                   (+ curr-idx 1)))
            )))

  [seq intvl]
  (let [results (zipmap (range intvl) (repeat [])) ; start with a result hash, one key for each list with each value an empty vec
        indexed (partition 2 (interleave seq (range (count seq))))] ; start with the original list partitioned and interleaved with indices 1 through (+ 1 (count seq))

        (loop [r results i indexed]
          ; recursively drop items from the front, checking the second (the index) with the mod function and adding it to the hash
          (if (= 0 (count i))
            (for [sorted (sort r)] (second sorted)) ; return values of r sorted by key
            (let [m (mod (second (first i)) intvl) ; m is the mod value of index % intvl - the current bucket to be adding the value to
                  v (first (first i))] ; the value at the top of pending items
              (recur
                (assoc r m (conj (get r m) v)) ; add an item to the list in the proper results bucket
                (drop 1 i)) ; drop the first item from the list
              )))
          ))

(fn [source-list num-of-partitions]
  (loop [l source-list
         p (vec (repeat num-of-partitions []))
         i 0]
    (if (< 0 (count l)) 
      (let [[h & r] l 								;; take head from source list
            next-index (mod (inc i) num-of-partitions) 				;; compute next index
            part (nth p i)							;; get partition
            updated-partition (conj part h)			;; update partition
            updated-partitions (assoc p i updated-partition)] ;; update partitions
        (recur r updated-partitions next-index))
      p)))
